author: Crystal Bell
title: Cravity Are K-pop’s Endearing Rookie Rule Breakers
description: Cravity are K-pop rookies who are breaking all the rules with their debut album "Hideout: Remember Who We Are." In this interview with MTV News, members Serim, Allen, Jungmo, Woobin, Wonjin, Minhee, Hyeongjun, Taeyoung, and Seongmin talk about debut expectati…
content: In their electrifying debut single "Break All The Rules," the nine members of Cravity boldly claim, "Ill be what I want to be / I paint my future as I see." It's a confident declaration for a group so new a whole week old in a competitive industry like K-pop … [+16975 chars]
